3.name: Tavern Customer
3.text:
"Did they say Isuku-san? That person spends the
whole day sitting in front of the bard, endlessly
listening to heroic tales and muttering things
like 'respect,' 'death,' and 'impossible'."

4.name: Tavern Customer
4.text:
"I see, so it was a dragon... In that case, it's
no wonder they're eccentric... (glance)"

5.name: Sol
5.text:
"I feel like there's a rumor going around about
the dragon causing damage!!!"

8.name: Barkeep
8.text:
"Hey Sol-chan. You look lively today too! Let me
treat you to a meal!"

9.name: Sol
9.text: "Yay! A feast! I wonder what I can eat!"

10.name: Bar owner
10.text: "(I guess it's a dog after all...)"

13.name: Mother
13.text: "Oh, what a lovely dragon. Hello there."

14.name: Sol
14.text: "Ehehe, hello! I'm a dragon, you know!"

16.name: Villager
16.text:
"Oh, it's the Golden Dragon-sama...!! You look as
beautiful as ever today...!!"

22.name: Aunt
22.text:
"Oh my, Sol-chan, you're so lively and cute today!
Here, take this meat pie! Eat a lot and grow big!"

23.name: Sol
23.text:
"Thank you, Auntie! Ehehe, I'm so happy! It's
delicious, mogu mogu."

25.name: Ossan
25.text:
"Ohh! Sol-chan! Your tail looks as good as ever!
Here, take this apple!"

26.name: Sol
26.text:
"Yaaay, thank you, mister! But only looking at my
tail is sexual harassment, you know?"

28.name: Minstrel
28.text:
"Oh my, to be able to see the appearance of Lady
Kinryu-sama today as well! When you have a great
day, please allow me to present a poem in your
honor!"

29.name: Sol
29.text:
"Ohhh... my heroic tale!! It's embarrassing yet
delightful!!"

31.name: Priest
31.text:
"Oh, golden dragon maiden, welcome. Are you here
for worship today?"

32.name: Sol
32.text: "Ehehe, I'm thinking of praying to Mother!"

36.name: Sol
36.text: "Ehehe, everyone seems to be doing well too!"

38.name: Adventurer
38.text: "Hey, Lady Kinryu! Are you making a profit?"

41.name: Adventurer
41.text:
"Oh my, Lady Gold Dragon. You seem to be in good
spirits today as well."

44.name: Adventurer
44.text:
"Good day, Sol-san. You haven't caught a cold or
anything, have you?"

45.name: Sol
45.text: "Good day! I'm full of energy today too!"
